      • addVote

        Vote addVote(java.lang.Long userIdVote,
           java.lang.Long userIdReceive,
           java.lang.Long itemId,
           int voteType,
           float reability,
           java.lang.String voteMessage)
             throws UserNotFoundException,
                    ItemNotFoundException,
                    InvalidVoteUsersException
        Adds a vote between the given users. Saves it as "pending" both users didn't vote each other yet. If the first user who voted first emits a NEGATIVE VOTE and the other users emits a POSITIVE VOTE, for BOTH VOTES reability will be the one BEFORE that votes (others votes could affect).
        Parameters:
        userIdVote -
        userIdReceive -
        itemId -
        reability -
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
        ItemNotFoundException
        InvalidVoteUsersException
